SCYX The recently issued convertible bond is at 135share and has been sold out from its institutional buyer meaning the strike is probably higher for the bondholders now so that means there is an arbitrage at 135 short the stock down to 135 and youre hedged with the stock underlying the convertible bond if you can borrow at less than the convertible bond interest rate you are locking in a profit So there is some level near this price that is a true support level not some arbitrary chart level
